sources.title: Summoning Sources
sources.description: Select the sources you want to be available in the Summoning Menu.

defaultImages.title: Restrict Summons to One's with Token Images By Default
defaultImages.description: Only creatures that have a token image will be available to summon by default. The filter can be disabled by clicking the "Only Creatures with Images" button in the Summoning Menu.

onlyImages.title: Only Allow Summons With Token Images
onlyImages.description: Only creatures that have a token image will be possible to summon. You will not be able to turn off this filter.

autoAccept.title: Automatically Accept Summoning Requests
autoAccept.description: The GM no longer will need to accept a Summoning Request from a Player.
